other_tests.findings: Normal sinus rhythm at a rate of 78 beats/min with slight peaked T waves in leads V2 to V4 deemed insignificant.
New right bundle branch block with inverted T waves in leads V2 to V6.
Diagnosis of type IV RTA confirmed with elevated potassium and metabolic acidosis.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient was stabilized with bicarbonate therapy.
